import React from "react" import propTypes from "prop-types" import * as style from "./Button.module.scss" export const Button = ( { icon, iconClass, isIconShown, spinner, text, textClass, wrapperClass }) => { return (

{text}
) } Button.defaultProps = { icon: "", iconClass: "", isIconShown: true, spinner: false, text: "Save", textClass: "", wrapperClass: "" } Button.propTypes = { icon: propTypes.bool, iconClass: propTypes.string, isIconShown: propTypes.node, text: propTypes.string, textClass: propTypes.string, wrapperClass: propTypes.string }
